body.name: Gel Seat Cushion Pillow for Long Sitting – Office Chair Car Egg Seat Cushion with Non-Slip Cover for Back, Coccyx & Tailbone Pain Relief Pad - Pressure Reducing Honeycomb Designed for Comfort
features: Solve Your Uncomfortable Sitting Problem - Made with high quality gel material, our chair cushion will adapt to your body curves and providing your current chair with the support it lacks

No More Sweats - Unlike your memory foam cushion. Our advanced honeycomb grid design cooling gel coccyx seat cushion provides coolness while you are sitting, and it has a breathable cover, so you sit comfortable and cool
Won't Slide Around - Our computer chair cushion has a non slip bottom that stays in place even if you shift in your seat
Provide Tailbone Needed Relief & Sit In Comfort - Designed with honeycomb grids, our chair cushion suspends your coccyx above hard seating surfaces, relieving pressure, improving posture

Fits All Types of Seating & Comfort Everywhere - Versatile, use it as a car seat cushion, desk chair cushion, home, office chair or gaming chair butt pillow. Makes a great travel companion; Sit comfortably wherever you go

Amazing Practical Gift - This gel chair cushion can be used as a practical gift for family, friends and colleagues. Excellent comfort, effective support for the tailbone, to relieve the pressure on the hip caused by sedentary.

manufacturerProductDescription.media_text: HONEYCOMB & BREATHABLE DESIGN Unique honeycomb design cooling structure increases air circulation while provide the optimal density of cushioning. FLEXIBLE & DOUBLE LAYER It combines soft sitting comfort with stable support to evenly absorb, double layer thickness for more support dissipate body pressure. It retains its shape even if you sit on it every day all day long and it won't lose its support. NON-SLIP BOTTOM The anti-slip bottom prevents it from slipping on any seat. Pretty suitable for your office or kitchen chairs, car, truck, wheelchair, computer desk chairs, and couch. REMOVABLE MACHINE WASHABLE COVER A built zipper is on the side of the removable cover. Easily unzip the cover on the back of the cushion and toss it into the wash.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Perfect for traveling to ballgames & back/leg pain sufferers!!!
reviews.reviewText: I am a chronic back pain sufferer & have been in pain management for over 10 years. My daughter plays college volleyball & I travel out of state via plane to her games. I cannot sit on the bleachers without support & this was something I could easily pack into my suitcase to fly without being bulky or weighing the luggage down. This is super comfortable for those with back-pain, leg pain, sciatica, etc. It’s light weight and easy to carry for elderly or weak people. The only thing that would make it better for me is if it had a seat back as either an option as well as the ability to purchase additional covers and colors to support your favorite teams! Worth the money!!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 6, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Comfortable for those who sit cross legged or slouch.
reviews.reviewText: I bought two different style shape of office cushions since I work from home. The previous one I bought had a unique shape to it and was way to firm and uncomfortable to sit on for a long time. This purchase on this pillow cushion felt right. I sit cross legged a lot and this cushion works well for that. I've only used it for aw week, but thoroughly enjoy it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 24, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars What a difference this makes.
reviews.reviewText: This cushion has been used for a week now. I work from home and my shifts are ten hours long four days in a row. I get a 30 min for lunch and three 15 min breaks. So I sit in one place for long periods of time. My lower back, tail bone and bottom always hurt. This cushion worked from day one. It doesn't get hot and it keeps all of me from hurting. I am impressed.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars not the same silicon rubber as the first one i bought
reviews.reviewText: i bought the smaller one 1 month ago. it had the purple silicon as pictured. i really like it, but it was smaller than i would have liked. so last week i ordered the larger one from this same company.i noticed right away it wasn't as soft and comfortable. i unzipped the cover and there is a different color of silicon. Blue, not purple. who cares what color it is, right? well... i used both hands at the same time and did a pinch test between the 2 cushions. the blue one is DEFINITELY not as soft. soooo...they changed their formula and didn't tell anyone. the cushion is just OK. i may keep it or may send it back and 'hope' i get one with the original formula. <sigh>

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 27, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Made road trips enjoyable again
reviews.reviewText: Since losing a significant amount of weight and the fact that my car is 13 years old and worn, riding in it for more than 20 minutes has become painful on my rear end. I purchased this cushion hoping it would help. I just returned from an 8 hour long drive and am very happy to report that I had not one uncomfortable minute. I have my love of road trips back and can’t wait for the next one.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 9, 2022
reviews.reviewText: I bought this cushion for my Mom who has a pin in her hip after a hip fracture repair. Riding in a vehicle for any length of time becomes uncomfortable and sometimes downright painful. With this cushion, discomfort/pain has been dramatically minimized. She can now endure the drive to/from our house with very little to no complaints. I’ve bought her one to leave in our truck and also one that she can transfer from vehicle to vehicle when riding in other peoples cars. It really has made such a difference in her comfort level, so in that it was worth every penny I paid for it.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars This hurt to sit on
reviews.reviewText: I had a purple cushion but was looking for a replacement. I have arthritis in my pelvis along my spine, but I can say this thing hurt my rear ALL OVER because it was hard as a rock! Not comfortable and had no give like the silicone I was used to before, more like it felt like hard plastic. I returned this. I can not recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 26, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Not that cushiony
reviews.reviewText: Its alright, but doesn't compare to my old one because the rubber is very stiff. There is no bend to the honeycomb patterned cushion, so itll save you from sitting in a superflat seat buuut dont expect squishyness.
